entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:37 AM MST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
